titleStmt.title: A faithful testimony for the Lord against this nation of Englands iniquity and idolatry and oppression because of which the land mourneth : being also a warning to all people to consider what they have done, and what they are a doing / [by] Laurence Taylor.
titleStmt.author: Taylor, Laurence.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Friends' Library (London, England).
